content: प्रशमन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Calming, tranquillizing, pacifying, removing &c. {@--2@} Curing, healing. --नं {@--1@} Calming, tranquillizing, pacifying. {@--2@} Allaying, assuaging, soothing, mitigating; आपन्नार्तिप्रशमनफलाः संपदो ह्युत्तमानां <ls>Me. 53.</ls> {@--3@} Curing, healing; as in ष्याधिप्रशमनं. {@--4@} Quenching, extinguishing, suppressing, quelling. {@--5@} Cessation, abatement. {@--6@} Bestowing fitly or on fit objects; <ls>Ms. 7. 56</ls>; (सत्पात्रे प्रतिपादनं <ls>Kull.</ls>; but others give it the next sense). {@--7@} Securing, guarding, keeping safe; लब्धप्रशप्ननस्वस्थमथैनं समुपस्थिता <ls>R. 4. 14.</ls> {@--8@} Killing, slaughter.
